at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller cardname deals n damage to that player
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller cardname deals n damage to that player
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller cardname deals n damage to that player
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller cardname deals damage equal to that creature's power to that player unless they sacrifice another creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller cardname deals n damage to that player unless they sacrifice that artifact
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller cardname deals n damage to that player
